key.name: automatic-schedule
key.description: Enables automatic scheduling of the bedtime mode in the time range specified by the start and end times

key.name: schedule-start-hours
key.description: The hours at which the bedtime mode will be enabled

key.name: schedule-start-minutes
key.description: The minutes at which the bedtime mode will be enabled

key.name: schedule-end-hours
key.description: The hours at which the bedtime mode will be disabled

key.name: schedule-end-minutes
key.description: The minutes at which the bedtime mode will be disabled

key.name: ondemand-button-placement
key.description: Location where the on-demand button will be placed
